content.text:
# 1949 New York Film Critics Circle Awards

15th New York Film Critics Circle Awards
February 5, 1950(announced December 27, 1949)
----
'''All the King's Men
The 15th New York Film Critics Circle Awards, honored the best filmmaking of 1949.
Winners
*Best Film:
**''All the King's Men
*Best Actor:'
**Broderick Crawford - ''All the King's Men
*Best Actress:
**Olivia de Havilland - The Heiress
*Best Director:
**Carol Reed - The Fallen Idol
*Best Foreign Language Film:
**Bicycle Thieves (Ladri di biciclette)'' â€¢ Italy
